game.name: Gachi Defense
game.shortDescription: Gachi Defense is an incredible combination of fantasy and gachimuchi in the genre of survival with elements of tower defense. Hordes of slaves led by Darkholme invaded the world of simple boys, in order to enslave everyone. Your goal is to hold out as long as possible, crushing every enemy...
game.shortDescriptionEn: Gachi Defense is an incredible combination of fantasy and gachimuchi in the genre of survival with elements of tower defense. Hordes of slaves led by Darkholme invaded the world of simple boys, in order to enslave everyone. Your goal is to hold out as long as possible, crushing every enemy...
